entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
